DOC.criteria: Healthy subject either gender , 18 year old , able give inform consent A score ocular discomfort 020 mm visual analogue scale ( VAS ) prior treatment Known hypersensitivity constituent medication Known corticosteroid responder ( elevation intraocular pressure [ IOP ] ) Known allergic disposition ( e.g . hay fever ) Need ocular antiallergic treatment Wearing contact lenses Any kind current eye disease ( e.g . dry eye ) Any kind concomitant ocular treatment Any injury infection either eye last 3 month prior first application Any medication take within last 28 day prior first application , except hormonal contraceptive Concomitant previous treatment antihistamine within week prior enrolment Pregnant breast feed woman Participation another clinical study within 4 week prior enrolment Hematological disease aplastic anemia , panmyelopathy , hemolytic icterus ; severe dysfunction liver .
